snippet: --As the train from Boston for Newton, on the Worcester Railroad, was going out on Wednesday morning, it came in contact with the Dedham train on the Providence Railroad which was backing out to its station in Roxbury, after having landed its pass...
lead_paragraph: --As the train from Boston for Newton, on the Worcester Railroad, was going out on Wednesday morning, it came in contact with the Dedham train on the Providence Railroad which was backing out to its station in Roxbury, after having landed its passengers in the city. The engine and one car of the Newton train was thrown from the track, and the engine was severely damaged.
